alert.note: Alert for Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:26PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Otsego County through 500 PM EDT... At 426 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Middlefield, or 10 miles east of Cooperstown, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Middlefield, Westford, Elk Creek and Betty And Wilbur Davis State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
